body.p: Sir A vacancy haveing occured in the office of Justice of the Peace in District No 1 Knox County inconsequence of my resignation as a Justice in said District, I would most respectfully recomed to your Excellcy O P Herndon. as worthy honest and competent to fill said vacancy and hope you will commission him as such The vacancy in District No 8 for which you have heretofore commissd John Bright & James Worn was caused by the resignations of William Carnes and A J Cope

Very Respectfully
W W Pope
Presiding Judge of
Knox County Ky
Barbourville
March 26" 1862

Knox Co
J. P.
Dist No
Issd Apr. 24. 1862
